WorkItem.ClosedComment: Added settings for HTTP Proxy and FTP Proxy.
WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

our Proxy Server authenticate the Active-Directory User via LDAP. In every Browser it is working. In WPP i can not Update the Catalog, allways i get: Unable to download the File. See Screenshot.

Click on Test Connectivity is always OK.

Is it possible to get a Option for Proxy-Settings in Tools > Settings? Proxy-URL or IP, Username and PW and Port.

Thanks.

Comments.Message:
Oh yes, looks very good. ;)

Can i test before it comes in Release?
No problem. I will send a beta release to all WPP testers'.
